front.title: Deployment of inter-operable and cost-effective monitoring infrastructure in ISP networks

abstract.t: This document identifies issues and concerns in monitoring ISPnetworks. It outlines the components of a monitoring infrastructuredesigned to support ISP requirements. It discusses deployment andinter-operability issues. Related IETF working groups are identified.The goal of this document is to open a discussion on whether thereshould be a BOF addressing this issue at the next IETF (Vienna, July2003).
